A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not quite sure how i feel about this installment of Star Wars.  Being an old school fan\, I liked the Force Awakens as it went back to the old school type of filming and set up a new era of storytelling quite well.  I felt more confused with this installment as to just where it was headed towards.  Like I say\, not quite sure where this is all headed this time.  I guess JJ will decided where we go next.  Hope he knows what to do.
